item.title: Private Server Menu Maker
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Uhh, I get what you’re trying to do, but it just writes out ‘sendQuest("’+line1+’", 8148);’ in the debug box, I think you meant to have it write the code in an editor or something, but correct me if I’m wrong. But on the plus side, you definately have the WriteLn(’’); procedure down, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Private Server Menu Maker
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

This isnt my FIRST script cuz i made a few when kaitnieks was still up… i forgot most of what i knew and my old ones sucked anyways so heres my pimp ass “first” script
[scar]program New;
var menuname, title,line1, line2, line3, line4, line5, line6, line7, line8, line9, line10, line11, line12,line13, line14, line15, line16, line17, line18, line19, line20, line21, line22, line23, line24, line25, line26, line27, line28, line29, line30, line31, line32 : string;
begin
///////////////fill out the form.///////////////////////////////////////
menuname:= ‘deedeedee’ // like thatoneservermenu() or something… the name of the void
title:= ’ ’ //do not add the () in the menu name :D//////////////////
line1:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line2:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line3:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line4:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line5:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line6:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line7:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line8:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line9:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line10:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line11:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line12:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line13:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line14:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line15:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line16:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line17:= ’ ’ //
line18:= ’ ’ //
line19:= ’ ’ //
line20:= ’ ’ //
line21:= ’ ’ //
line22:= ’ ’ //
line23:= ’ ’ //
line24:= ’ ’ //
line25:= ’ ’ //
line26:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line27:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line28:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line29:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line30:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line31:= ’ ’ //////////////////
line32:= ’ ’ //////////////////
writeln(’’)
writeln(’’)
writeln(’’)
writeln(’’)
writeln(‘public void ‘+menuname+’() {’)
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+title+’", 8144); //Title’)
writeln(’ clearQuestInterface();’)
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line1+’", 8145);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line2+’", 8146);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line3+’", 8147);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line4+’", 8148);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line5+’", 8149);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line6+’", 8150);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line7+’", 8151);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line8+’", 8152);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line9+’", 8153);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line10+’", 8154);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line11+’", 8155);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line12+’", 8156);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line13+’", 8147);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line14+’", 8148);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line15+’", 8149);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line16+’", 8150);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line17+’", 8151);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line18+’", 8152);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line19+’", 8153);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line20+’", 8154);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line21+’", 8155);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line22+’", 8156);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line23+’", 8147);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line24+’", 8148);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line25+’", 8149);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line26+’", 8150);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line27+’", 8151);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line28+’", 8152);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line29+’", 8153);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line30+’", 8154);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line31+’", 8155);’);
writeln(’ sendQuest("’+line32+’", 8156);’);
writeln(’’)
writeln(’ sendQuestSomething(8143); ‘)
writeln(’ showInterface(8134); ‘)
writeln(’ flushOutStream();’)
writeln(’}’)
writeln(’///////////////////////////////////’)
end.[/scar]
